ValidationRule.description: Acquisition opportunity cannot move from closed lost to other stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Closed Lost"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")), RecordType.Name = 'Acquisition' && NOT($User.Exempt_from_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot update Opportunity Stage: Once set to Closed Lost, the stage cannot be changed. Please reach out to Sales Ops for support.
